name: Bio-based and Biodegradable Industries Association
membership: BBIA is a member of BON, the Bioplastics Organisations Network, loosely managed by the European Bioplastics Association. BBIA is also member of the Scottish IBIOIC, and is member of two committees on the British Standards Institute, dealing with compostable packaging and Circular Economy
memberOrga: All members can be found on the member page, at www.bbia.org.uk
goal: The Association's mission is to promote the bioeconomy in the UK and specifically the development of markets for bio-based and biodegradable products and chemicals as well as there production in the UK.  The association represents those industries active in these markets, and affiliated organisations and consultancies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Development, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Trade
